friendship.quotes: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
friendship.author: Marcel Proust

friendship.quotes: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
friendship.author: Walter Winchell

friendship.quotes: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
friendship.author: Herodotus

friendship.quotes: There is nothing in this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

friendship.quotes: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
friendship.author: Helen Keller

friendship.quotes: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
friendship.author: H.Jackson Brown Jr.

friendship.quotes: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

friendship.quotes: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
friendship.author: Hubert H. Humprey

friendship.quotes: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
friendship.author: Anais Nin

friendship.quotes: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
friendship.author: Walt Whitman

friendship.quotes: One of the most beautiful, qualities of true friendship us to understantd and to be understood.
friendship.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

friendship.quotes: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasure. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

friendship.quotes: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
friendship.author: Oprah Winfrey

friendship.quotes: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
friendship.author: Henry Ford

friendship.quotes: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
friendship.author: Jim Morrison

friendship.quotes: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
friendship.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

friendship.quotes: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends, who have given me a heart full of joy.
friendship.author: Charles R. Swindoll

friendship.quotes: There are no strangers here. Only friends you haven’t yet met.
friendship.author: William Butler Yeats

friendship.quotes: The friend in my adversity I shall always cherish most I can better trust those who helped to relieve the gloom of my dark hours.
friendship.author: Ulysses S. Grant

friendship.quotes: True friends stab you in the front.
friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

friendship.quotes: A friend to all is a friend to none.
friendship.author: Aristotle

friendship.quotes: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those dew be tried before you give them your confidence.
friendship.author: George Washington

friendship.quotes: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
friendship.author: Albert Schweitzer

friendship.quotes: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
friendship.author: Euripides

friendship.quotes: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obessession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
friendship.author: Ellie Wiesel

friendship.quotes: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
friendship.author: Mencius

friendship.quotes: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
friendship.author: Abraham Lincoln

friendship.quotes: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
friendship.author: Alice Walker

friendship.quotes: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests.
friendship.author: Chanakya

friendship.quotes: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man frienship.
friendship.author: William Blake

friendship.quotes: A true friends is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
friendship.author: Len Wein

friendship.quotes: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod, my shadow does that much better.
friendship.author: Plutarch

friendship.quotes: Be slow to fall into friendshipl but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
friendship.author: Socrates

friendship.quotes: Friendship… is not something you learn in school.
friendship.author: Muhammad Ali

friendship.quotes: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
friendship.author: Thomas Fuller

friendship.quotes: It is not so much our friends help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
friendship.author: Epicurus

friendship.quotes: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

friendship.quotes: True friendship multiplies the good life and divides its evils.
friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian

friendship.quotes: To find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune, to keep him is a blessing.
friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian

friendship.quotes: Some people go to priests, others to poetry, I to my friends.
friendship.author: Virginia Woolf

friendship.quotes: Friends and good manners will carry you where no money won't go.
friendship.author: Margaret Walker

friendship.quotes: A single rose can be my garden, a single friend, my world.
friendship.author: Leo Buscaglia

friendship.quotes: Never explain- your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard

friendship.quotes: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
friendship.author: Bill Watterson

friendship.quotes: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
friendship.author: Henry Van Dyke

friendship.quotes: A man's friendship are one of the best measures of his worth.
friendship.author: Charles Darwin

friendship.quotes: Frienship is one of those things that give value to survival.
friendship.author: C.S.Lewis

friendship.quotes: My friends are my estate.
friendship.author: Emily Dickinson

friendship.quotes: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m, that matter.
friendship.author: Marlene Dietrich

friendship.quotes: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
friendship.author: John D. Rockefeller

friendship.quotes: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
friendship.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

friendship.quotes: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubting of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

friendship.quotes: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
friendship.author: John Leonard

friendship.quotes: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
friendship.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

friendship.quotes: I never considered a difference of opinion, in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.
friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

friendship.quotes: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends.
friendship.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

friendship.quotes: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
friendship.author: Doug Larson
